name: Harvy Tile
description:
The game

You are tasked to create the best farmland possible. Move the farmtiles together, which would make taking care of this lands easier for the farmer. Group tiles together and gain points and money to keep going. Try to get the highest score possible. 

This game was my entry for the ludum dare 52 game jam. The load times may take a while, since there was not a lot of time to optimize the game.  There are three levels that load quickly. The freeform takes a while, since it plays in a random world. 

Control

You can move the camera with zsqd, wsda or the arrow keys. Click on the tile you want to move and click on a tile next to switch the tiles. As soon as two tiles of the same connect, those are locked. 

R -  Restart level
Escape - Main menu

Water cannot be moved.
